welcome.message:
Greetings! I'm the Headmaster of this Academy. I'm glad you've arrived - we have much work to do.

What would you like to know?

about-academy.message:
This Academy has long been a center for creating magical items. Our workshops and foundries produce equipment that helps explorers venture into the unknown.

With your expertise, we can push the boundaries of what's possible.

responses.text: What else can you tell me?

about-wilderness.message:
The wilderness is vast and largely uncharted. Strange creatures roam there, and ancient secrets wait to be discovered.

Our explorers will need the best equipment we can craft to survive out there.
